title: Operando observation of the dynamic SEI formation on a carbonaceous electrode by near-ambient pressure XPS
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1509-1519
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03228K, Paper
F. G. Capone, J. Sottmann, V. Meunier, L. Pérez Ramírez, A. Grimaud, A. Iadecola, M. Scardamaglia, J.-P. Rueff, R. Dedryvère
Operando near-ambient pressure XPS was carried out on a glassy carbon electrode. For the first time, the dynamic formation of the SEI in contact with the liquid electrolyte was detected by XPS.
